info.author: Vadim Fint
info.description:
########
greenish
########

What is this?
=============

Set of wrappers to help make objects green even if they are not green by
design.

This is done by allocating separate thread/process (or pool of them) to handle
calls which will normally block whole gevent thread and communicate with them
via pipes.

What to read next?
==================

* Continue with reading documentation at http://greenish.rtfd.org

What is this?

Set of wrappers to help make objects green even if they are not green by design.

This is done by allocating separate thread/process (or pool of them) to handle calls which will normally block whole gevent thread and communicate with them via pipes.

What to read next?

  • Continue with reading documentation at http://greenish.rtfd.org
